control.name: Encrypt personal data
control.desc:
Implement encryption at rest (see guidance below) or give risk-based explanation why encryption was not implemented. Use well known encryption libraries, taking into account the data use, and do not invent your own. 

  • personal data must be encrypted 
  • data that is not used by the application (e.g. passwords, â€¦) should be hashed so they cannot be recovered easily

test.steps:
• Verify user personal data processed by the application is encrypted at rest (eg databases). 
  • If encryption is not being leveraged verify documentation exists outlining the reasoning for that decision.
